title: Seat Added
description: Fired when a seat or license is provisioned for a user in a B2B account.

seatId.description: Unique identifier for the seat or license.

userId.description: Unique identifier for the user assigned the seat.

role.description: The role assigned to the user for this seat.

licenseType.description: The type of license provisioned, e.g. 'standard', 'admin', 'viewer'.

totalSeats.description: Total number of seats available on the account.

usedSeats.description: Number of seats currently in use on the account.

plan.description: The plan associated with the account.
